net.jhoogland.jautomata.semirings

Interface Semifield<K>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of the elements of the semifield
    All Superinterfaces:
    Semiring<K>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanSemiring, LogSemiring, RealSemiring, TropicalSemiring

    public interface Semifield<K>
extends Semiring<K>
    Semifields must implement this interface. A semifield is a semiring with a multiplicative inverse for all non-zero values. The Boolean, real, and tropical semirings are examples of semifields. The multiplicative inverse is used by the Determinization operation.
    Author:
    Jasper Hoogland

    • Method Detail

      • inverse

        K inverse(K x)
